item.name: Anon - Get All Opportunities (Trigger SWU Hook)
Gov - Update Proposal 1 (Screen In to CC)
Gov - Update Proposal 2 (Screen In to CC)
Gov - Update CWU Proposal 1 - Add Note Copy
(ALT) Gov - Update Proposal 2 (Screen Out Of CC)
Gov - Update Proposal 1 (Screen in to TS)
Gov - Update Proposal 2 (Screen in to TS)

item.description:
This collection will perform the following:

- Log in an admin user, a gov user, and 4 vendors
- Create a SWU opportunity, edit the draft and submit for review
- Publish the SWU opportunity (admin)
- Add an addendum to the opportunity
- Create two vendor organizations
- Add capabilities and accept terms to satisfy the RFQ (x 2)
- Submit a proposal for each organization
- Close the SWU opportunity by changing the proposal date (hook will set to EVAL)
- Evaluate the team questions, code challenge, team scenario, price for each proposal
- Award the proposal
